trending.reason: n8n's latest release introduces a significant AI-powered feature for workflow automation, impacting developers and businesses.
TIME Magazine's exclusive profile on Figure AI's new humanoid robot signals major advancements in consumer robotics.
A new strategic partnership aims to accelerate the adoption of advanced drone technology within the U.S. defence sector.

articles.title: n8n Introduces AI Workflow Builder (Beta) on Cloud
articles.excerpt: The latest n8n release, version 1.116.0, introduces an AI Workflow Builder on its cloud platform, allowing users to generate workflows from text prompts.
articles.author: n8n Community
articles.fullContent:
n8n's new feature allows users to build workflows using natural language prompts.

AI-Powered Automation Arrives on n8n Cloud

Automation platform n8n has rolled out its AI Workflow Builder in beta for cloud users, enabling the creation of complex workflows from simple text descriptions. The feature, included in version 1.116.0, is now available to builders on Trial, Starter, and Pro plans, aiming to significantly lower the barrier to entry for creating powerful automations.

From Prompt to Production

The core function of the AI Workflow Builder is to interpret a user's prompt and generate a functional workflow, complete with the necessary nodes, logic, and structure. This allows users to describe their desired automation in natural language, such as "create a workflow that sends a summary of new Typeform submissions to a Slack channel," and the AI will construct the corresponding flow. This dramatically speeds up the development process, especially for complex or multi-step automations.

"Accelerate your vision from prompt to possibility. Use text to generate a living workflow with nodes, logic and structure that you can shape and ship." — n8n Community Announcement

While the initial rollout is limited to n8n Cloud, there are plans to potentially extend the feature to self-hosted instances in the future. The beta phase will be used to gather feedback and continue evolving the AI's capabilities for the broader n8n community.

Key Takeaways

  • ✔ AI-Powered Generation: Users can now create workflows by describing their goal in plain text.
  • ✔ Cloud Beta Release: The feature is available in beta for n8n Cloud users on Trial, Starter, and Pro plans.
  • ✔ Increased Accessibility: This significantly lowers the technical expertise required to build sophisticated automations.
  • ✔ Future Expansion: The company plans to continue evolving the feature based on community feedback.

articles.title: This Week in Star Citizen: Alpha 4.3.2 and Nyx PTU Tease
articles.excerpt: Following CitizenCon, the latest update recaps community events, provides timing for the upcoming Alpha 4.3.2 patch, and targets the Nyx system for a future PTU release.
articles.author: The Impound
articles.fullContent:
Concept art for the Nyx system, which is targeted for a future PTU build.

Post-CitizenCon Update Details Patch and PTU Plans

Cloud Imperium Games has released its weekly update for Star Citizen, outlining the next steps after a successful CitizenCon event. The studio confirmed plans for the upcoming Alpha 4.3.2 patch and teased the Nyx system as a target for a future Public Test Universe (PTU) build.

CitizenCon Recap and Future Patches

The post began by recapping the successful CitizenCon watch parties and community engagement surrounding the event. Looking ahead, the development team noted that the Alpha 4.3.2 patch is in its final stages of preparation before being deployed to the live servers. While a specific release date was not provided, the update suggests its release is imminent.

Furthermore, the update provided an early look at what's next for the PTU, with the Nyx system being a primary target for upcoming test builds. This lawless system, known for its asteroid fields and scavenger-run station, will offer players new environments and gameplay opportunities to explore and test once it becomes available.

Key Takeaways

  • ✔ Alpha 4.3.2 Imminent: The next incremental patch for Star Citizen is nearing its live release.
  • ✔ Nyx System PTU: Developers are targeting the Nyx system for a future release on the Public Test Universe.
  • ✔ Post-CitizenCon Momentum: The update follows a period of high community engagement after the game's annual convention.

articles.title: Study Finds Karnak Temple Was Built Atop a 3,000-Year-Old Island
articles.excerpt: Geoarchaeological research reveals that Egypt's famed Karnak Temple complex was constructed on a natural, sacred island in the Nile River, reshaping the historical understanding of the site.
articles.author: Times of India
articles.fullContent:
The Karnak Temple complex was a vital religious centre in ancient Egypt.

Karnak's Foundations Reveal a Sacred River Island

A recent geoarchaeological study has revealed that the Karnak Temple complex, one of ancient Egypt's most significant religious sites, was built upon a sacred island that existed in the Nile River around 3,000 years ago. This discovery challenges previous assumptions and provides new context for the temple's location and religious importance.

Drilling for Answers

Researchers used geological core drilling to analyse the land beneath the temple complex. The sediment cores revealed that the massive structures were not built on the floodplain of the Nile's east bank as long believed, but rather on a natural high point of land, an island, that would have been surrounded by the river's waters during ancient times.

This island, which researchers have termed a 'hydro-island,' would have been a place of immense symbolic importance, likely associated with the creation myths of the ancient Egyptians, where the primordial mound of creation emerged from the waters of chaos. Building the temple on this naturally elevated and sacred land would have reinforced its religious authority and connection to the gods.

Key Takeaways

  • ✔ Island Foundation: The Karnak Temple was constructed on a natural island within the ancient Nile River.
  • ✔ Geoarchaeological Evidence: Core drilling and sediment analysis confirmed the island's existence beneath the complex.
  • ✔ Religious Significance: The island's location likely held deep symbolic meaning related to Egyptian creation myths.
  • ✔ Historical Revision: The finding reshapes the understanding of the temple's original landscape and siting.

articles.title: Inside Figure AIâ€™s Next-Generation Humanoid Robot for the Home
articles.excerpt: A TIME Magazine feature profiles Figure 03, the latest humanoid robot from Figure AI, and CEO Brett Adcockâ€™s vision for creating mass-producible humanoids for household tasks.
articles.author: TIME
articles.fullContent:
Figure AI aims for its new robot, Figure 03, to perform domestic chores.

Figure AI Unveils Humanoid Robot Designed for Mass Production

Startup Figure AI has revealed its next-generation humanoid robot, Figure 03, with the ambitious goal of deploying bots capable of performing manual labour across the global economy and, eventually, in homes. Upon its debut, the robot can already perform some domestic chores like folding clothes and loading a dishwasher, though it still requires human assistance. The company is now focused on a large-scale data collection effort to train the robot's neural network for a wider range of tasks.

The Vision for a Robotic Workforce

Figure AI's CEO, Brett Adcock, believes the humanoid robot industry is on the verge of exponential growth, similar to the recent advancements in digital AI. His vision extends to a future where billions of humanoid robots are integrated into the workforce and every home has a robot to handle daily chores. Adcock predicts that a humanoid robot company will become the largest in the world within the next decade.

"In the next 10 years—maybe under 10 years—the biggest company in the world will be a humanoid robot company." — Brett Adcock, CEO of Figure AI

The company's internal neural network, named Helix, is designed to learn new tasks from relatively small amounts of data. Human 'pilots' wearing VR headsets perform tasks like folding laundry and interacting with kitchen environments, generating the video data needed to train the robots. While Figure 03 is not yet ready for autonomous home use, Adcock aims to have the robot in select homes by 2026.

Key Takeaways

  • ✔ Next-Gen Humanoid: Figure AI has unveiled Figure 03, a robot designed for both industrial and domestic work.
  • ✔ Current Capabilities: The robot can perform simple chores like folding laundry but still requires human oversight.
  • ✔ Ambitious Goals: CEO Brett Adcock aims to mass-produce the robots and deploy them in homes by 2026.
  • ✔ AI Training: The robot learns from a neural network trained on video data of humans performing various tasks.

articles.title: Draganfly Partners with Global Ordnance on U.S. Defence Drones
articles.excerpt: Draganfly has entered a formal agreement with U.S. defence contractor Global Ordnance to accelerate the adoption of its unmanned aerial systems (UAS) by the U.S. military and its allies.
articles.author: Draganfly Inc.
articles.fullContent:
Draganfly's Commander 3XL drone has already been adopted by branches of the U.S. Department of Defense.

Draganfly and Global Ordnance Form Strategic Alliance

Drone solutions developer Draganfly Inc. has announced a strategic partnership with Global Ordnance, a prime contractor for the U.S. Defense Logistics Agency. The agreement aims to accelerate the adoption of Draganfly's drone platforms within the U.S. defence sector and allied markets, focusing on creating sovereign, mission-ready systems.

Combining Technology with Logistics

The partnership will leverage Global Ordnance's extensive experience in defence contracting and logistics with Draganfly's advanced drone technology. The collaboration will work to embed manufacturing and responsive supply chain support to deliver mission-specific capabilities tailored to the needs of U.S. and allied forces. This move is intended to enhance the availability and operational readiness of critical unmanned aerial systems (UAS).

"We are thrilled to join forces with Global Ordnance as a leading defense provider. Their track record in U.S. defense, logistics, and mission support complements Draganfly's capabilities in advanced autonomy systems and defense-grade UAS manufacturing." — Cameron Chell, CEO of Draganfly

Meeting Growing Defence Demands

The global market for military drones is expanding rapidly, with projections showing significant growth driven by the demand for intelligence, surveillance, and reconnaissance (ISR) capabilities. Draganfly's existing platforms, such as the Commander 3XL and Flex FPV drones, are already in use by the U.S. Department of Defense and other international defence organizations, positioning the company as a key player in this growing market.

Key Takeaways

  • ✔ Strategic Partnership: Draganfly and Global Ordnance have teamed up to supply drones to the U.S. defence market.
  • ✔ Sovereign Supply Chain: The alliance focuses on building a secure, U.S.-based manufacturing and supply chain for drone systems.
  • ✔ Established Technology: Draganfly's drones are already being used by U.S. and international defence agencies.
  • ✔ Market Growth: The collaboration is poised to capitalise on the rapidly expanding global military drone market.

articles.title: Microsoft Plans GitHub Overhaul to Fend Off AI Coding Rivals
articles.excerpt: Microsoft executives have outlined a major push to transform GitHub into a comprehensive hub for AI software development, integrating new tools to compete with emerging AI-native coding platforms.
articles.author: Business Insider
articles.fullContent:
Microsoft is evolving GitHub to be more than just a code repository.

GitHub to Become Central Hub for AI Development

Microsoft is planning a significant overhaul of its GitHub platform to position it as the central hub for AI-powered software development. The strategy involves integrating a suite of new tools and capabilities designed to help developers build, test, and deploy AI applications, directly addressing the rise of specialised AI coding competitors.

Competing in an AI-Native World

With the emergence of AI-native startups and tools that are changing how software is created, Microsoft is proactively evolving GitHub beyond its traditional role as a code repository. The planned overhaul aims to make GitHub an indispensable environment for the entire AI development lifecycle. This includes enhanced versions of GitHub Copilot and new services for managing the complex workflows associated with training and deploying AI models.

Executives outlined a push to make GitHub the go-to platform for everything from individual AI-assisted coding to large-scale enterprise AI projects. The initiative reflects a broader Microsoft strategy to infuse AI into all its products and maintain its dominance in the developer tools market. By creating a more integrated and AI-centric experience, GitHub aims to retain its massive user base and fend off rivals that offer more specialised AI development platforms.

Key Takeaways

  • ✔ Strategic Overhaul: Microsoft is transforming GitHub into an all-in-one platform for AI software development.
  • ✔ Competitive Pressure: The move is a direct response to the growing number of AI-native coding tools and platforms.
  • ✔ Integrated Tooling: The new GitHub will feature enhanced AI capabilities, including advanced versions of Copilot.
  • ✔ End-to-End Development: The goal is to support the entire AI lifecycle, from coding and testing to deployment and management.

articles.title: HYGH Speeds Delivery with ChatGPT Business
articles.excerpt: A case study by OpenAI details how digital advertising company HYGH is using ChatGPT Business to accelerate the development of Minimum Viable Products (MVPs) and streamline ad campaigns.
articles.author: OpenAI
articles.fullContent:
HYGH leverages AI to enhance its digital out-of-home advertising services.

ChatGPT Business Accelerates Ad Tech Development at HYGH

Digital out-of-home advertising company HYGH is successfully leveraging ChatGPT Business to shorten development cycles and improve campaign efficiency, according to a new case study from OpenAI. The AI tool is being used across multiple teams to speed up the creation of Minimum Viable Products (MVPs) and refine advertising strategies.

Streamlining Operations with AI

The case study highlights how various departments at HYGH have integrated ChatGPT Business into their workflows. Development teams use the tool to quickly prototype new features and accelerate the path to an MVP. Meanwhile, marketing and campaign management teams are using the AI to analyse data, generate creative copy, and optimise ad placements, leading to faster and more effective campaign rollouts. The adoption of ChatGPT Business has allowed HYGH to become more agile, responding to market demands and client needs with greater speed and precision.

Key Takeaways

  • ✔ Faster MVPs: HYGH's development teams are using ChatGPT Business to accelerate product prototyping.
  • ✔ Efficient Campaigns: The AI helps marketing teams to quickly generate and optimise ad campaigns.
  • ✔ Cross-Team Integration: The tool has been adopted by multiple departments to improve overall operational efficiency.
  • ✔ Increased Agility: The use of AI enables HYGH to respond more quickly to market changes and client requirements.

articles.title: Cities: Skylines 2 â€˜Bridges and Portsâ€™ Arrives Oct 29
articles.excerpt: After multiple delays, the 'Bridges and Ports' expansion for Cities: Skylines 2 is set to release on October 29, adding new maritime features, maps, and over 100 new assets.
articles.author: Andy Chalk
articles.fullContent:
The expansion introduces new bridge types and port customisation.

'Bridges and Ports' Expansion Finally Gets Release Date

Paradox Interactive and Colossal Order have announced that the long-awaited 'Bridges and Ports' expansion for Cities: Skylines 2 will launch on October 29. The expansion, which was delayed twice, promises to enhance city coastlines with new maritime-focused content.

New Maritime and Infrastructure Content

The 'Bridges and Ports' DLC will introduce a range of new features for players to manage their city's waterfronts. This includes new bridge types like drawbridges, along with fully customisable port and harbour areas that can be expanded to handle more cargo and passenger traffic. The expansion will also add new maritime industries such as fishing piers, open-water fishing boats, and offshore farms.

Players can build and expand custom port areas.

In total, the DLC includes over 100 new assets, new maps designed to make use of the coastal features, and new achievements. The release comes after a challenging period for the game, which has faced criticism for performance issues since its launch. The development team delayed the expansion to focus on improving the core game, making this release a crucial one for its community.

Key Takeaways

  • ✔ Release Date: The 'Bridges and Ports' expansion will be available on October 29.
  • ✔ New Features: Includes new bridge types, customisable ports, and maritime industries.
  • ✔ Extensive Content: Adds over 100 new assets, new maps, and achievements.
  • ✔ Delayed Release: The expansion was previously delayed twice to allow for improvements to the base game.

articles.title: Report: Valveâ€™s â€˜Deckardâ€™ VR Headset Enters Mass Production
articles.excerpt: A new report from a Chinese analyst firm claims that Valve's next-generation VR headset, codenamed 'Deckard', has entered mass production, with a potential launch before the end of 2025.
articles.author: Tom's Hardware
articles.fullContent:
Valve's successor to the Index has been rumoured for years under the codename 'Deckard'.

Valve's Next VR Headset Reportedly Ramping Up for Launch

Valve's long-rumoured successor to the Index VR headset has reportedly entered mass production, according to a Chinese analyst firm. The device, known by the codename 'Deckard' and potentially to be branded as 'Steam Frame', could launch as early as the end of 2025 to capitalise on the holiday season.

Production and Launch Details

The report from the XR Research Institute suggests that Valve is planning to ship between 400,000 and 600,000 units annually. This production volume indicates a premium, niche device rather than a mass-market competitor to headsets like the Meta Quest 3S. Rumours have long suggested that the new headset will be a standalone device capable of wirelessly streaming PC VR games, putting it in a unique position in the market.

Evidence for the new hardware has been mounting for years, with references to 'Deckard' appearing in SteamVR code since 2021. More recently, developer versions of the hardware have been spotted in SteamVR beta code, further suggesting that a consumer release is approaching. While Valve has not officially confirmed any details, the latest supply chain leaks point towards a significant re-entry into the VR hardware space for the company.

Key Takeaways

  • ✔ Mass Production: Leaks suggest Valve's next VR headset is now in mass production.
  • ✔ Potential 2025 Launch: The device may be released before the end of the year.
  • ✔ Standalone Capability: The headset is rumoured to be a standalone device that can also stream PC VR content wirelessly.
  • ✔ Official Name: While codenamed 'Deckard', the final product may be called 'Steam Frame'.

articles.title: Meta Quest 3S Hits Lowest Price for October Prime Day
articles.excerpt: During Amazon's October Prime Day event, the Meta Quest 3S VR headset dropped to its lowest price yet, reaching $249 and bundled with games and a trial subscription.
articles.author: Tom's Guide
articles.fullContent:
The Quest 3S offers many of the same features as the premium Quest 3 at a lower price point.

Quest 3S Becomes More Accessible with Prime Day Discount

Meta's budget-friendly VR headset, the Quest 3S, received a significant price cut during Amazon's October Prime Day sale, dropping to an all-time low of $249. The 17% discount on the 128GB model made the entry-level headset an even more compelling option for consumers curious about virtual reality.

Value-Packed Bundles

The deal was sweetened with bundled extras. The 128GB model came with a Gorilla Tag DLC pack, while the 256GB version, which was discounted to $329, included the highly anticipated game Batman: Arkham Shadow. Both bundles also included a three-month trial subscription to Meta Horizon+, which provides access to a rotating library of VR games.

"The Meta Quest 3S contains many of the Quest 3's signature features, including color passthrough, speedy performance, a compact design, and a robust app library... its low starting price makes it an enticing product for those curious about VR." — Tony Polanco, Tom's Guide

The Quest 3S shares the same powerful Snapdragon XR2 Gen 2 processor as the more expensive Quest 3, ensuring flagship-level performance. The key difference lies in the display and lenses, which use technology from the previous generation to keep costs down. At its discounted price, the Quest 3S presents one of the best values in the VR market, turning virtual reality from a niche enthusiast product into a more realistic option for the average household.

Key Takeaways

  • ✔ Record Low Price: The Meta Quest 3S (128GB) was reduced to $249 during the October Prime Day sale.
  • ✔ Bundled Content: Deals included game DLCs like Gorilla Tag or full games like Batman: Arkham Shadow, plus a Meta Horizon+ trial.
  • ✔ High Performance: The headset features the same Snapdragon XR2 Gen 2 processor as the premium Quest 3.
  • ✔ Market Positioning: The aggressive pricing aims to make VR more accessible to a mainstream audience.

articles.title: JWST Spots Dust-Shrouded Red Supergiant Before It Exploded
articles.excerpt: The James Webb Space Telescope has identified the progenitor star of a supernova, revealing a massive red supergiant cloaked in a thick veil of dust, solving a long-standing astronomical mystery.
articles.author: Charlie Kilpatrick, Northwestern University
articles.fullContent:
JWST's infrared vision allowed it to see the doomed star through obscuring dust.

Webb Telescope Solves Mystery of 'Missing' Exploding Stars

Astronomers using the James Webb Space Telescope (JWST) have captured the most detailed view ever of a star before it exploded, identifying for the first time a supernova's progenitor in mid-infrared light. The findings reveal that the explosion, named SN 2025pht, originated from a massive red supergiant star hidden within a thick cocoon of dust, potentially explaining why these types of stars are rarely seen before they go supernova.

Piercing the Cosmic Veil

For decades, scientists have been puzzled by the apparent lack of red supergiants in pre-explosion images, despite models predicting they should be a common source of supernovae. This new research, published in The Astrophysical Journal Letters, suggests that these stars do explode but are often obscured from view. The JWST's powerful infrared capabilities allowed it to pierce through the cosmic dust that rendered the star invisible to other telescopes, like Hubble.

"It's the reddest, dustiest red supergiant that we've seen explode as a supernova. That tells us that previous explosions might have been much more luminous than we thought because we didn't have the same quality of infrared data that JWST can now provide." — Aswin Suresh, Northwestern University

The progenitor star, located in galaxy NGC 1637, was about 100,000 times brighter than our sun, but the dense dust cloud made it appear over 100 times dimmer in visible light. This discovery is the first time JWST has been used to identify a specific star that later exploded, bridging a critical gap between theoretical models and astronomical observations.

Key Takeaways

  • ✔ First of its Kind: This is the first time JWST has identified a specific progenitor star that later went supernova.
  • ✔ Solving a Mystery: The discovery suggests that missing red supergiant explosions were simply hidden by dense dust clouds.
  • ✔ Powerful Infrared Vision: Webb's ability to see in infrared was crucial for piercing the dust that obscured the star from other telescopes.
  • ✔ Extreme Object: The star was described as the 'reddest, dustiest' red supergiant ever observed to have exploded.

articles.title: Hundreds of Ancient Celtic Coins Found in Czech Republic
articles.excerpt: Archaeologists have uncovered a significant trove of hundreds of gold and silver coins and other artifacts in the Pilsen region, hinting at a previously unknown Celtic seasonal market.
articles.author: Live Science
articles.fullContent:
The find includes previously unknown types of Celtic coins.

Major Celtic Trove Unearthed in Czech Republic

A remarkable discovery of around 500 gold and silver coins, jewelry, and other artifacts dating from the 6th to the 1st century B.C. has been made by archaeologists in the northern Pilsen region of the Czech Republic. The finds, scattered over a large area, suggest the site may have been a seasonal commercial centre for a previously unknown Celtic settlement.

A Site of Commerce, Not Settlement

The artifacts were discovered over the past five years in a rural area that is still actively farmed, with the exact location being kept secret to prevent looting. Unlike a typical hoard where items are buried together, these objects were found scattered across 12-16 hectares, indicating they were likely lost over time during regular activity. The absence of evidence for a permanent settlement leads archaeologists to believe the site was used for seasonal gatherings, possibly for trade.

"Among the gold and silver coins there are also previously unknown mintings, which may change the current view of Celtic coinage in Bohemia." — Daniel StrÃ¡nÃ­k, Archaeologist

The discovery began in 2021 when a single gold coin was found by a metal detectorist who reported it to the authorities, triggering the full-scale excavation. The collection is considered exceptional for the Central European region and includes unique gold jewelry from the Hallstatt period. The coins are now undergoing analysis to determine the origin of the gold.

Key Takeaways

  • ✔ Significant Find: Around 500 gold and silver coins, plus other artifacts, were discovered.
  • ✔ Possible Market: Evidence suggests the site was a seasonal trading location, not a permanent settlement.
  • ✔ New Discoveries: The trove includes previously unknown types of Celtic coins.
  • ✔ Secret Location: The site's location is being protected to prevent illegal looting.

articles.title: Researchers Entangle Remote Qubits via a Two-Mode Squeezed Reservoir
articles.excerpt: A new paper demonstrates a method for autonomously entangling distant superconducting qubits by using a continuous-variable squeezed microwave source as a shared reservoir.
articles.author: arXiv
articles.fullContent:
Schematic of the experiment for entangling two remote qubits.

New Method Achieves Autonomous Entanglement of Distant Qubits

Researchers have successfully demonstrated the autonomous entanglement of two distant superconducting qubits. According to a paper published on arXiv, the breakthrough was achieved by coupling the qubits to a shared, engineered reservoir that generates two-mode squeezed microwave radiation.

Engineered Reservoir Drives Entanglement

The experiment shows that the continuous-variable (CV) squeezed source can mediate a dissipative interaction between the two discrete-variable (DV) qubits. This interaction autonomously drives the qubits into a stable, entangled steady state without requiring any external control signals or measurement-based feedback. The entanglement is generated and maintained through the shared reservoir, representing a significant step towards building modular quantum computing architectures.

By correlating the noise between the two qubits, the two-mode squeezed reservoir creates the necessary conditions for entanglement to emerge and persist. This method provides a hardware-efficient approach for creating entangled links between remote quantum processors, a crucial component for scalable quantum networks.

Key Takeaways

  • ✔ Autonomous Entanglement: The method entangles remote superconducting qubits without external control signals.
  • ✔ Squeezed Microwave Source: A shared reservoir of two-mode squeezed radiation mediates the entanglement.
  • ✔ Dissipative Interaction: The process drives the qubits into a stable, entangled state.
  • ✔ Scalability: This technique is a promising step towards connecting remote quantum modules.

articles.title: Software Architect â€” Technical Resources Pty Ltd (Perth)

articles.title: Teslaâ€™s Optimus Shows Off Kung Fu at 'Tron: Ares' Premiere
articles.excerpt: Tesla's Optimus humanoid robot made a high-profile appearance at the 'Tron: Ares' world premiere, engaging in a playful kung fu face-off with actor Jared Leto on the red carpet.
articles.author: Times of India
articles.fullContent:
Optimus made its red carpet debut at the 'Tron: Ares' world premiere in Los Angeles.

Optimus Robot Makes Cinematic Red Carpet Debut

Tesla's humanoid robot, Optimus, made a notable appearance on the red carpet for the world premiere of Disney's 'Tron: Ares'. The robot was seen striking kung fu poses in a playful interaction with the film's star, Jared Leto, marking a significant public demonstration of the robot's capabilities and a unique promotional event.

A Choreographed Display

A video of the interaction quickly went viral, showing Optimus performing a series of choreographed, martial arts-style moves. The official Tesla Optimus account on X (formerly Twitter) posted a clip with the caption, "Tried to start a fight at the Tron : Ares premiere." The moves displayed on the red carpet were similar to a kung fu demonstration video shared by Elon Musk just days prior, suggesting the appearance was a well-prepared event.

"This partnership with Disney lets fans and stars experience the world of TRON like never before—turning the red carpet event into a collision between the real world and AI." — Monique Pintarelli, Head of the Americas at X

The event was part of a broader collaboration between Tesla, Disney, and Elon Musk's xAI platform to integrate advanced technology into interactive fan experiences. Optimus robots were also seen engaging with attendees and distributing theatre concessions, turning the premiere into an immersive showcase of real-world AI.

Key Takeaways

  • ✔ Red Carpet Debut: The Optimus robot appeared at the 'Tron: Ares' premiere, interacting with actor Jared Leto.
  • ✔ Viral Moment: A video of the robot performing kung fu moves gained widespread attention on social media.
  • ✔ Promotional Collaboration: The appearance was a joint effort by Tesla, Disney, and xAI to create an interactive AI experience.
  • ✔ Public Demonstration: The event served as one of the most significant public displays of the Optimus robot's progress.
